name: subgraph-basin
description: A subgraph for indexing events emitted by Basin.

scripts.deploy: yarn codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ basin
scripts.deploy-local: yarn codegen && graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 basin
scripts.deploy-hosted: yarn codegen && graph deploy --node http://graph.node.bean.money:8020/ --ipfs http://graph.node.bean.money:5001 basin
scripts.deploy-hosted-staging: yarn codegen && graph deploy --node http://graph.node.bean.money:8020/ --ipfs http://graph.node.bean.money:5001 basin-staging
scripts.deploy-hosted-dev: yarn codegen && graph deploy --node http://graph.node.bean.money:8020/ --ipfs http://graph.node.bean.money:5001 basin-dev
